Text:
If the game crashes or don't open, delete the configuration file "q3config.cfg" in the "q3base" folder.

It's my configuration, i force the game to run in a widescreen display.
Check out the expansion (Team Arena), i've uploaded it.

Ty for the upload, download at max speed ^^

This is compatible with Win7 x64, right?
@larsaaby94 I don't tested with a 64-bit Windows.
Umm... it didnt load but the error screen came up. it said some thing about pixels or making my resolution different.  i deleted the config file but the error screen still pops up
Thanks for the upload! This archive contains all the necessary pak files for ioQuake3, just make sure to remove q3config.cfg or it won't start (in Ubuntu 10.10 64-bit).

It just says "Unknown method in [.7z file]" a lot.
I have 7zip as well but it says "Unsupported compression method."
